epwm_app.c File Reference

This file contains PWM test application which sets a particular duty cycle in PWMSS1 output A (EHRPWM1A) which can be verified through external pin probing. More...

#include "epwm_app.h"

 Frequency of PWM output signal in Hz - 1 KHz is selected.
 
#define APP_EHRPWM_DUTY_CYCLE   (25U)
 Duty Cycle of PWM output signal in % - give value from 0 to 100.

 APP run time in seconds.
 
#define APP_RUN_TIME_ISRCOUNT   (APP_RUN_TIME * APP_EHRPWM_OUT_FREQ)
 APP run count in event equal zero ISR count.
 
#define SOC_EHRPWM_MODULE_FREQ   (133U * 1000U * 1000U)
 Functional clock to the PWMSS. Fixed for the platform - can't be changed.
 
#define APP_EHRPWM_TB_FREQ   (SOC_EHRPWM_MODULE_FREQ / 4U)
 TB frequency in Hz - so that /4 divider is used.

Detailed Description

This file contains PWM test application which sets a particular duty cycle in PWMSS1 output A (EHRPWM1A) which can be verified through external pin probing.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define APP_EHRPWM_COMPA_VAL
Value:
(APP_EHRPWM_PRD_VAL - \
((APP_EHRPWM_DUTY_CYCLE * \
APP_EHRPWM_PRD_VAL) / 100U))
APP_EHRPWM_PRD_VAL
#define APP_EHRPWM_PRD_VAL
PRD value - this determines the period.
Definition: epwm_app.c:98
APP_EHRPWM_DUTY_CYCLE
#define APP_EHRPWM_DUTY_CYCLE
Duty Cycle of PWM output signal in % - give value from 0 to 100.
Definition: epwm_app.c:75

COMPA value - this determines the duty cycle.

COMPA = (PRD - ((dutycycle * PRD) / 100)

#define APP_EHRPWM_INST_BASE_ADDR   (SOC_PWMSS1_IPWMSS_BASE)

PWM instance base address.

Note: If changed to other instance, PRCM and pinmux changes needs to be taken care in the application.

#define APP_EHRPWM_OUTPUT_CH   (CSL_EPWM_OUTPUT_CH_A)

Output channel - A or B.

Note: If changed to channel B, pinmux changes needs to be taken care in the application.

#define APP_EHRPWM_PRD_VAL
Value:
((APP_EHRPWM_TB_FREQ \
/ APP_EHRPWM_OUT_FREQ) / 2U)
APP_EHRPWM_OUT_FREQ
#define APP_EHRPWM_OUT_FREQ
Frequency of PWM output signal in Hz - 1 KHz is selected.
Definition: epwm_app.c:72
APP_EHRPWM_TB_FREQ
#define APP_EHRPWM_TB_FREQ
TB frequency in Hz - so that /4 divider is used.
Definition: epwm_app.c:90

PRD value - this determines the period.

PRD = (TBCLK/PWM FREQ) / 2 NOTE: /2 is added becasue up&down counter is selected. So period is 2 times

Function Documentation

static void CSL_epwmAppPwmCfg ( CSL_EpwmAppPwmObj_t *  pObj)
static

This API configures the ePWM module.

Parameters
pObjpointer to the ePwm object data structure.

High resolution feature is supported only on PWM A channel. If channel is A then proceed with High Resolution processing.
